name: Aleedex Research & Consulting
description:
Aleedex Inc is Digital Marketing Company formed by Farid Premani. Farid has 12 years of experience working for Fortune 500 companies and small businesses serving clients globally.
He has authored 4 books, coached 10,000 marketers around the globe doing consulting and growing companies to level enjoying digital leads from automobile, telecom, government, education, health care to diverse range of sector.
